statements: SELECT * FROM employee_information;
SELECT employee_name, employee_role FROM employee_information;
SELECT employee_id, employee_name, certification FROM employee_information WHERE employee_role = 'Manager';
SELECT * FROM employee_information ORDER BY employee_name ASC;
SELECT employee_id, employee_name, certification FROM employee_information WHERE certification IS NOT NULL;
SELECT employee_name, employee_role FROM employee_information WHERE certification = 'Java' ORDER BY employee_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM employee_information WHERE employee_role = 'Manager' ORDER BY employee_id DESC;
SELECT employee_id, employee_name, certification FROM employee_information WHERE schedule LIKE '%Monday%' AND employee_name LIKE '%Smith%' ORDER BY employee_id;
SELECT DISTINCT employee_role FROM employee_information WHERE certification IN ('Python', 'SQL') ORDER BY employee_role;
SELECT employee_name, schedule, certification FROM employee_information WHERE employee_role = 'Developer' AND certification IS NOT NULL ORDER BY schedule ASC, employee_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM employee_information;
SELECT name, email FROM employee_information WHERE employee_id = 1;
SELECT certification_name, expiration_date FROM certification_information WHERE certification_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM employee_information WHERE employee_id = 3;
SELECT employee_id, name, email, schedule FROM employee_information WHERE name LIKE '%John%';
SELECT * FROM employee_information WHERE employee_id = 1;
SELECT name, email FROM employee_information WHERE name LIKE 'J%';
SELECT certification_name, expiration_date FROM certification_information ORDER BY expiration_date DESC;
SELECT name, email FROM employee_information WHERE schedule LIKE '%Monday%' OR schedule LIKE '%Friday%';
SELECT e.name, c.certification_name FROM employee_information e INNER JOIN certification_information c ON e.employee_id = c.certification_id;
SELECT * FROM employees;
SELECT employee_name, email FROM employees ORDER BY employee_name DESC;
SELECT phone_number, hire_date FROM employees WHERE phone_number IS NOT NULL;
SELECT employee_name, hire_date FROM employees WHERE hire_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT employee_name, hire_date FROM employees WHERE hire_date < '2021-06-30' ORDER BY hire_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM employees ORDER BY employee_name DESC, hire_date ASC;
SELECT e.employee_name, c.certification_name, c.issue_date FROM employees e JOIN certifications c ON e.employee_id = c.employee_id WHERE c.expiration_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT e.employee_name, s.schedule_date, s.start_time, s.end_time FROM employees e JOIN schedules s ON e.employee_id = s.employee_id WHERE s.schedule_date = '2022-08-15';
SELECT e.employee_name, e.email, s.schedule_date, s.start_time, s.end_time FROM employees e LEFT JOIN schedules s ON e.employee_id = s.employee_id WHERE s.schedule_date IS NULL;

SELECT e.employee_name, count(c.certification_id) as total_certifications FROM employees e LEFT JOIN certifications c ON e.employee_id = c.employee_id GROUP BY e.employee_name HAVING total_certifications > 2;
SELECT * FROM employees;
SELECT employee_id, first_name, last_name, email FROM employees ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT schedule_id, employee_id, start_time, end_time FROM schedules WHERE day_of_week='Monday' ORDER BY start_time DESC;
SELECT certification_name, certification_date FROM certifications WHERE employee_id=1;
SELECT role_name, employee_id FROM roles ORDER BY employee_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM employees;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM employees WHERE employee_id = 1;
SELECT e.first_name, r.role_name, c.certification_name FROM employees e JOIN roles r ON e.employee_id = r.employee_id JOIN certifications c ON e.employee_id = c.employee_id;
SELECT e.first_name, s.day_of_week, s.start_time, s.end_time FROM employees e JOIN schedules s ON e.employee_id = s.employee_id WHERE s.day_of_week = 'Monday';
SELECT e.first_name, e.phone_number, c.certification_name, c.certification_date FROM employees e JOIN certifications c ON e.employee_id = c.employee_id WHERE c.certification_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM employees;
SELECT name, department FROM employees WHERE department = 'IT';
SELECT employee_id, name, department FROM employees ORDER BY department ASC;
SELECT employee_id, certification_name, certification_date FROM certifications WHERE certification_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT e.name, r.role_name, a.start_date FROM employees e JOIN roles r ON e.role = r.role_name JOIN assignments a ON e.employee_id = a.employee_id WHERE a.start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE department='IT' AND role='Manager' ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT e.name, e.department, s.shift_start FROM employees e JOIN schedules s ON e.employee_id = s.employee_id WHERE s.shift_start > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY s.shift_start ASC;

SELECT c.certification_name, c.certification_date, e.name FROM certifications c JOIN employees e ON c.employee_id = e.employee_id WHERE DATE(c.certification_date) = CURDATE() ORDER BY e.name, c.certification_date DESC;
SELECT r.role_name, COUNT(a.employee_id) AS total_assignments FROM roles r LEFT JOIN assignments a ON r.role_id = a.role_id GROUP BY r.role_name ORDER BY total_assignments DESC;
SELECT e.name, a.start_date, a.end_date FROM employees e LEFT JOIN assignments a ON e.employee_id = a.employee_id WHERE a.end_date IS NULL ORDER BY e.name ASC;
